#include<bits/stdc++.h>
 
using namespace std; 
 
#define     mod              1000000007
 
typedef long long ll;
 
#define     N   112345
#define     K   310  
 
ll dp[K][N],fact[K];
 
ll solve(int i , int k){
    ll& ret = dp[i][k];
    if( ret != -1 ) return ret;
    if( k == 0 )    return 1;
    if( i == 0 ){
        if( k == 0 )    return 1;
        return 0;
    }
    if( k < 0 ){
        return 0;
    }
    ret = ( solve(i-1,k) + solve(i,k-i) )%mod;
    return ret;
}
 
int main(){
    
    #ifndef ONLINE_JUDGE
        freopen("input.txt","r",stdin);
    #endif

    for(int i = 0 ; i <= 300 ; i++){
        for(int j = 0 ; j <= 100000 ; j++){
            dp[i][j] = -1;
        }
    }
    for(int i = 1 ; i <= 300 ; i++){
        for(int j = 0 ; j <= 100000 ; j++){
            dp[i][j] = solve(i,j);
        }
    }

    fact[0] = 1;
    for(int i = 1 ; i < 305 ; i++)
        fact[i] = ( fact[i-1] * i ) % mod;

    int t,n,k;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--){
        scanf("%d%d",&n,&k);
        int m = (n * (n+1))/2;
        k = k - m;
        if( k < 0 ){
            puts("0");
            continue;
        }
        ll ans = (dp[n][k] * fact[n])%mod;
        printf("%lld\n",ans);
    }
    return 0;
}
